Anyway..there's a very good "Aliens Only" subtitle at subscene..takes actual seconds to load and thus fix the flaw in this torrent..unless you don't mind 'turning English subs 'on'-'off' every time the 'Nabu' speak?

The mortal fatal flaw in McTorrents continues to be no Hardsubs for Non-English speaking parts.

Argo..Premium Rush..Avatar..many many more..TPB needs a new 'Indicator Code' to make it easier to find the TRULY superior torrents which the UL'er(s) have taken the time and have the skill and 'artistry' to create/provide hardsubs.
